promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic mythical horse grass-type pokemon with wooden hooves. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or horse. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Timberhoof, a a gigantic mythical horse grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: Tapu Wilderness-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "horse", "grass" or "Timberhoof". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, horse-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: "A majestic beast of the woodland realm, this equine titan's Tapu Wilderness-GX power whispers rebirth to the fallen forest, its hooves nurturing new life."
